verses.verse: As Many As <WG3745> Are <WG1526> Under <WG5259> Yoke <WG2218> Bondmen, <WG1401> <WG3588> Their Own <WG2398> Masters <WG1203> Of All <WG3956> Honour <WG5092> Worthy <WG514> Let Them Esteem, <WG2233> That <WG2443> Not <WG3361> The <WG3588> Name <WG3686> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1319> Be Blasphemed. <WG987>
